alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:23PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeast Minnesota through 1215 AM CDT... At 1122 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Rochester to near Brownsdale. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eyota around 1140 PM CDT. Grand Meadow and Dover around 1150 PM CDT. St. Charles around 1155 PM CDT. Spring Valley around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include County Roads 9 And 10, County Roads 3 And 108, County Roads 6 And 15, Salem Corners, Rock Dell, Mayville, County Roads 4 And 8, Rochester Airport, Washington and Waltham. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 185 and 235. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
